title: Money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010
summary: This graph describes the amount of Money spent on higher education in 200 .
\n The title states the data is limited to Asia , but the dataset proves to show the global data , separated by Continent : North_America , Europe Asia , Africa .
\n The data is shown in units of million Pounds ( GBP ) .
gold: The chart compares money spent in millions of pounds on different continents During 2010 , Africa spent only £ 50 million , being the least and Asia spent £ 310 million , being the most
